75631.「シャデルが どういう言葉を遺したのか……。\n さっそく 聞いてみましょう。: Now we can hear Shadel's final words...

75632.<pipipi_low>「ま…魔物に襲われ…深手を負ってしまった。\n もう一歩:
<pipipi_low>A...a monster attacked me...
The wound is quite serious...
I...I can't move at all...

75633.<pipipi_low>「わ…私は おそらく\n ここで 死ぬことに…なるだろう:
<pipipi_low>I...I am probably going to...die
here... So...I will leave this final message.

75634.<pipipi_low>「メルエ……。お前の…足が 治っ…たら\n ふたりで ヴ:
<pipipi_low>
"Merue...once your legs...are healed... We
can go to the...Milena Coast together..."
I'd always tell you that...

75635.<pipipi_low>「あれ…は ウソなんだ……。\n そんな日が来な…いこと:
<pipipi_low>It... was a lie... I knew... that
day would never come. I've been lying to
you...

75636.<pipipi_low>「お前に…は 正直に生きろと言い…続けたのに\n ウソを:
I told you... to live honestly... and you kept lying to me... and I still regret... not telling you the truth. I'm sorry
I couldn't tell you the truth...

75637.<pipipi_low>「ただ 足なんか…治らなくても お前に…は\n ひとりの:
But even if your leg doesn't heal, you have a wonderful personality as a human being. So... believe in yourself... and
live your life...

75638.<pipipi_low>「こ…この声が いつか\n お前のもと…へ届くことを 祈:
<pipipi_low>I hope this voice will reach you
one day...

75640.「シャデル……。\n 最後の最後まで メルエのことを\n 気にしていたのか……。:
Shadel... you cared about Merue until the very
end...

75641.「彼の最期の言葉が聞けて よかったです。\n 親友の遺品ですので どうか\n こ:
I am glad to hear his last words. As this is
my best friend's belongings, please let me
keep them.

75642.「そういえば 最初に ペンダントを拾われた方は\n 私の声が聞こえて おどろかれ:
By the way, the first person who picked up the pendant was frightened to hear my voice, wasn't he? Please let them know that I am
sorry for the inconvenience.

75644.「これには きっと\n メルエの声が 入っているのでしょう。\n さっそく 聞い:
This must have Merue's voice in it. I'll
listen to it right away.

75646.「シャデル叔父さんが もしも 生きていて\n このペンダントを 手に取った時のた:
I will memorize the message in case Uncle
Shadel is alive and takes this pendant.

75647.「私に…… 奇跡が もたらされました。\n そして その奇跡のチカラで\n 私は:
A miracle was brought to me. And with the
power of that miracle, I was able to walk.

75648.「歩けるようになったら 幸せになれる……。\n 小さい頃から そう信じきっていま:
I believed since I was a child that I would be
happy if I could walk... but now, to be
honest, I'm filled with anxiety...

75649.「シャデル叔父さん……。私は ワケあって\n 遠い遠い旅に 出なければなりません:
Uncle Shadel I have to go on a journey far,
far away for some reason. I will probably
never return.

75650.「だから 旅に出る前に\n 私の心の内を 話しておきます。:
So, before I leave for my trip, I'll tell you
what's on my mind.

75651.「シャデル叔父さん。私は 知っていました。\n 私の足が治らないのは わかってい:
Uncle Shadel. I knew. I knew my leg would
never heal, but you kept lying to me...

75652.「そんな叔父さんのウソに 私は 何度も\n はげまされました。叔父さんが いなか:
His lies have inspired me many times. If it
weren't for him, I might have given up
everything.

75653.「シャデル叔父さん。今まで ありがとう……。\n もう一度 ふたりで あの灯台が:
Uncle Shadel. Thank you for everything... I
wish we could have gone to Mirena Beach one
more time to see that lighthouse...

75655.「遠い旅に出ます……か。\n お互いを思いやりながら どちらの想いも\n 相手に:
Going on a distant journey...? It's a sad
story that neither of their feelings reached
the other while caring for each other...

75656.「すいません……。わがままついでに\n ひとつ 私からの お願いを聞いてください:
I'm sorry, but... while I'm being selfish,
please do me a favor.

75657.「私は このふたつのペンダントを\n ふたりが ずっと行きたいと願っていた\n:
I am going to take these two pendants to
Mirena Beach, a place we have both always
wanted to go.

75658.「特に意味は ありません。ありませんが\n 持ち主の気持ちが 込められている\n:
It has no particular meaning. But I want to
show the coast to the pendant that contains
the owner's feelings.

75659.「どうか ウェナ諸島 ヴェリナード領西にある\n 南西の桟橋まで 先導を お願い:
Please, could you lead us to the southwest
pier in Verinard West, Wena Islands? I will
follow you.

75660.「あなたが 先導してくれたおかげで\n 非力な私でも ここまで来ることができまし:
Thanks to your leadership, even I, a powerless
person, have made it this far. Thank you very
much.

75661.「大切な物には 持ち主の想いが宿るといいます。\n ふたつのペンダントに この海:
They say that a treasured object holds the thoughts and feelings of its owner. I am happy to be able to show you the scenery of this
beach on these two pendants...

75663.「ペンダントが 輝きだした……？\n こんな機能は ついてないはずですが……。:
The pendant started to shine...? I don't think
it's supposed to work like this.

75665.「こんな不思議なことが 起きるなんて……。\n まるで この海岸に来られたことを:
It's so strange that something like this could
happen, as if we were both happy to be here on
this beach...

75666.「あのペンダントの願いを かなえることが\n もしかしたら 天から与えられた\n:
Maybe it was my mission from heaven to fulfill
the wish of that pendant...

75667.「あなたには すっかり\n お世話に なってしまいましたね。\n どうぞ こちら:
You have been a great help to me. Please
accept this.

75668.「ペンダントを 拾われた方にも\n よろしくお伝えください。それでは……。:
Please give my regards to the person who
picked up the pendant. Now then...

78240.「……おや？ どうやら 持ち物が\n いっぱいのご様子。あずかっておきますので\:
...Oh? It seems that you have a lot of
belongings. I'll leave them with you, so
please come back later to get them.

78241.「最後まで お付き合いいただき\n 本当に ありがとうございました。\n 私は:
Thank you very much for your time. I will
leave you now.
